h1.span: Caverna Independent's Letter to Families: COVID-19 Update March 22, 2020

span.p: First, we want to thank all of our students and families for working extremely hard to complete the nontraditional instruction at home. We know this has been challenging and different, but our first week has been a great success. There is no higher priority for Caverna Schools than protecting the health and safety of our students, staff, families, and community. We are focused on students staying healthy and continuing to learn.
